amendment.purpose: An amendment to incorporate new language into the text of H. Res. 244, considered to have been added upon adoption of this resolution. The amendment would clarify that the U.S. Attorney should proceed pursuant to his determination of propriety according to the law and the facts with respect to the issuing of subpoenas under the Federal Contested Elections Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Solomon amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.
